text: Na pitharo o manga Yahodi a: "Da so manga Kristian ko agama ontol;" go pitharo o manga Kristian a: "Da so manga Yahodi ko agama ontol." A siran na kapphangadian iran so kitab. Izananan a pitharo o siran a da a manga mlng iyan so lagid o katharo iran; na so Allah i khokom kiran ko alongan a qiyamah ko di iran phagayonayonan
